cliente conferma di aver preso visione della informativa privacy di Lyca Mobile e acconsente al trattamento dei suoi dati ln base alla normativa vigente come modificata dal GDPR Regolamento Ue

nienza e Lyca Mobile IN CASO DI RICHIESTA DEL SERVIZIO PORTABILITÁ DEL NUMERO MOBILE (MNP) VERSO LA RETE Dl LYCAMOBILE S.R.L. INFORMATIVA AI SENSI DEL D. LGS. N. 196/2003 (CO
DICE IN MATERIA DI PROTEZIONE DEI DATI PERSONALI)
Ai sensi dell’art. 13 del d. lgs. n. 196/2003 (ex art. 10 Legge n. 675/96), La informiamo che i dati personali da Lei forniti, di cui Le garantiamo la massima riservatezza nel rispetto della citata normati
trans:
client confirms that he/she has visioned the privacy policy of Lyca Mobile and agrees to the processing of his/her data ln accordance with the current legislation as amended by the GDPR Regulation Eu
2016/67 and the purposes described in point 1 .1 of the policy. In case of a request for number portability is made, the customer agrees to the exchange of the necessary Information between the home operator
and Lyca Mobile IN CASE OF REQUEST FOR THE SERVICE PORTABILITY OF THE MOBILE NUMBER (MNP) TOWARDS THE NETWORK OF LYCAMOBILE S.R.L. INFORMATION IN ACCORDANCE TO LEG. DECREE N. 196/2003 (CO
DE REGARDING THE PROTECTION OF PERSONAL DATA)
In accordance to art. 13 of Legislative Decree No. 196/2003 (formerly art. 10 Law No. 675/96), we would like to inform you that the personal data you provided, of which we guarantee the utmost confidentiality in compliance with the aforementioned normative
